text:
<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: multiple_errors
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{id: 1, "items": ["a" "b",]}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"id": 1, "items": ["a", "b"]}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: unquoted_keys
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{key1: "val1", key2: "val2"}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"key1": "val1", "key2": "val2"}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: missing_comma_array
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
[{"id": 1} {"id": 2}]
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
[{"id": 1}, {"id": 2}]
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: unquoted_keys
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{id: 123, active: true}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"id": 123, "active": true}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: unquoted_keys
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{id: 123, active: true}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"id": 123, "active": true}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: missing_comma_properties
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{"x": 10 "y": 20 "z": 30}
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
{"x": 10, "y": 20, "z": 30}
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: missing_comma_array
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
["apple" "banana" "orange"]
<|end|>
<|assistant|>
["apple", "banana", "orange"]
<|end|>

<|system|>
Task: json_correction
Format: generic
Error type: missing_comma_properties
<|end|>
<|user|>
Fix this invalid JSON:
{"x": 10 "y": 20 "z": 30}
<|end|>
